TneTabItem Class

Summary

This class represents a tabitem in the control

Namespace: neTabItem
Inheritance Hierarchy
TTabItem
  neTabItem.TneTabItem
Syntax
Delphi
type
 [ComponentPlatforms(pidWin32 or pidWin64 or pidOSX32)]
 TneTabItem = class(TTabItem)
 end;

The TneTabItem type exposes the following members.

CanClose

If true the tab can close and the close button is shown at the right side of the tab
